channel.title: Can someone please help me, i really need the help
channel.description:
This is the "Ultimate Server Guide" step i am having trouble with : ______________________________________________________________________________________________
Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
Name: 1 IP address: 2 TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always
_____________________________________________________________________________________________
Now i put in my IP adress, and i try to go into the advanced option, but i dont see the "Gaming" option , and i cant find that form, can someone help me?

item.title: Can someone please help me, i really need the help
item.dc:creator: @zezimamo zezimamo
item.description:
@zezimamo wrote:

i dont see anything that looks like the one on the ultimate server guide. i see totally different things, i cant explain how they look

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please help me, i really need the help

item.title: Can someone please help me, i really need the help
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Is this your second topic on this?

Don’t make another one regarding this problem or there will be consequences…

Anyway, what options do you see…?

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone please help me, i really need the help
item.dc:creator: @zezimamo zezimamo
item.description:
@zezimamo wrote:

This is the “Ultimate Server Guide” step i am having trouble with :

Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always

Now i put in my IP adress, and i try to go into the advanced option, but i dont see the “Gaming” option , and i cant find that form, can someone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone please help me, i really need the help
